name: GIRLFLY
description: Young women and GNC youth ages 14-19 who are strongly interested in performing, making positive change in the world, and who can commit to attending the entire 4 weeks of the program. African American, Arab, Latinx, Native, Asian and Pacific Islander, low-income, and QBIPOC identified girls/GNC youth are strongly encouraged to apply. The primary requirement is that you like to dance, and be creative.
